III.ii.2.F.3.a
.
Origin of the Extracts From SGO Records
In 1988, the National Research Council, a private research organization, provided NPRC with extracts from approximately ten million military hospital admission records in the custody of the Army Surgeon General's Office (SGO).Â  Numerical data in the extracts required decoding, which NPRC completed May 18, 1990.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F - Fire-Related Records, Supplementary or Substitute Records, and Records for Unique Situations
